sentence: Until there is a plan, for the safety of our citizens and those seeking asylum, they should not lift it,? said Wisconsin state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, who is running for the Democratic Senate nomination.
title: More Dem Senate hopefuls split with Biden on border
